learn.title: Learn Web Programming: Free Courses for beginners
learn.description1: Learn how to develop and program your own web applications from scratch. Courses of HTML, CSS, JS, React, Next, Tailwind y much more...
learn.description2: Web programming is a very useful skill that allows you to create solutions, collaborate with others and access a broad and dynamic job market. In addition, improves your logical, creative and analytical thinking, and makes you part of a universal language.
learn.description3: The web (Internet) is constantly expanding and technology is advancing every day... What are you waiting for?
